name: Hardcore Dungeon

Gameplay Video

Steam Greenlight Page

This is a 2D game that is just about fighting waves of enemies and beat each level.

You can choose 3 different classes, Fighter, Archer and Mage. Each has different abilities you can use to fit your own play-style.

There are in total 10 levels and each level will get harder and harder.

You will also meet different bosses in different levels, some of them are scary as hell, some of them are tanky as rock.

Features:

- Save system, continue your game at anywhere.

- 10+ different abilities, choose your fighting style.

- Advance spawning system, you will never see where they are coming from.

- Available in different screen resolutions, ranging from 1024 x 576 to 2560 x 1440. No worry about limitations.

- Vsync to avoid fps jumps

- Different badges when you defeated the whole dungeon.

- And many more cool features.
